verses.verse: Then Joseph<WH3130> went<WH935> in and told<WH5046> Pharaoh,<WH6547> and said,<WH559> "My father and my brothers<WH1> and their flocks<WH251> and their herds<WH6629> and all<WH1241> that they have, have come<WH3605> out of the land<WH935> of Canaan;<WH776> and behold,<WH3667> they are in the land<WH2009> of Goshen.<WH776>"
And he took<WH3947> five<WH2568> men<WH376> from among<WH7097> his brothers,<WH251> and presented<WH3322> <WH6440> them to Pharaoh.<WH6547>

Then Pharaoh<WH6547> said<WH559> to his brothers,<WH251> "What<WH4100> is your occupation<WH4639>?" So they said<WH559> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> "Your servants<WH5650> are shepherds,<WH7462> both<WH1571> we and our fathers."

And they said<WH559> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> "We have come<WH935> to sojourn<WH1481> in the land,<WH776> for there<WH369> is no<WH369> pasture<WH4829> for your servants<WH5650>' flocks,<WH6629> for the famine<WH7458> is severe<WH3515> in the land<WH776> of Canaan.<WH3667> Now,<WH6258> therefore, please<WH4994> let your servants live<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Goshen.<WH1657>"
Then Pharaoh<WH6547> said<WH559> to Joseph,<WH3130> "Your father and your brothers<WH1> have come<WH251> to you.

"The land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> is at your disposal;<WH6440> settle<WH3427> your father and your brothers<WH1> in the best<WH251> of the land,<WH4315> let them live<WH776> in the land<WH3427> of Goshen;<WH776> and if<WH1657> you know<WH518> any<WH3045> capable<WH3426> men<WH2428> among them, then put<WH376> them in charge<WH7760> of my livestock.<WH8269>"
Then Joseph<WH3130> brought<WH935> his father Jacob<WH1> and presented<WH3290> <WH5975> him to Pharaoh;<WH6440> and Jacob<WH6547> blessed<WH3290> Pharaoh.<WH1288>
And Pharaoh<WH6547> said<WH559> to Jacob,<WH3290> "How<WH4100> many<WH4100> years<WH8141> have you lived<WH9132>?"

So Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> "The years<WH8141> of my sojourning<WH4033> are one hundred<WH3967> and thirty;<WH7970> few<WH4592> and unpleasant<WH7451> have been<WH1961> the years<WH8141> of my life,<WH9132> nor<WH3808> have they attained<WH5381> the years<WH8141> that my fathers lived<WH1> during the days<WH9132> of their sojourning.<WH3117>"
And Jacob<WH3290> blessed<WH1288> Pharaoh,<WH6547> and went<WH3318> out from his presence.<WH6440>

So Joseph<WH3130> settled<WH3427> his father and his brothers,<WH1> and gave<WH251> them a possession<WH5414> in the land<WH272> of Egypt,<WH776> in the best<WH4714> of the land,<WH4315> in the land<WH776> of Rameses,<WH776> as Pharaoh<WH7486> had ordered.<WH6547>
And Joseph<WH3130> provided<WH3557> his father and his brothers<WH1> and all<WH251> his father's household<WH3605> with food,<WH1004> according<WH3899> to their little<WH6310> ones.<WH2945>

Now there<WH369> was no<WH369> food<WH3899> in all<WH3605> the land,<WH776> because<WH3588> the famine<WH7458> was very<WH3966> severe,<WH3515> so that the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> and the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667> languished<WH3856> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the famine.<WH7458>

And Joseph<WH3130> gathered<WH3950> all<WH3605> the money<WH3701> that was found<WH4672> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> and in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667> for the grain<WH7668> which<WH834> they bought,<WH7666> and Joseph<WH3130> brought<WH935> the money<WH3701> into Pharaoh's house.<WH1004>

And when the money<WH3701> was all<WH8552> spent<WH8552> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> and in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> all<WH3605> the Egyptians<WH4714> came<WH935> to Joseph<WH3130> and said,<WH559> "Give<WH3051> us food,<WH3899> for why<WH4100> should we die<WH4191> in your presence<WH5048>? For [our] money<WH3701> is gone.<WH656>"
Then Joseph<WH3130> said,<WH559> "Give<WH3051> up your livestock,<WH4735> and I will give<WH5414> you [food] for your livestock,<WH4735> since<WH518> [your] money<WH3701> is gone.<WH656>"

So they brought<WH935> their livestock<WH4735> to Joseph,<WH3130> and Joseph<WH3130> gave<WH5414> them food<WH3899> in exchange for the horses<WH5483> and the flocks<WH6629> and the herds<WH1241> and the donkeys;<WH2543> and he fed<WH5095> them with food<WH3899> in exchange for all<WH3605> their livestock<WH4735> that year.<WH8141>

And when that year<WH8141> was ended,<WH8552> they came<WH935> to him the next<WH8145> year<WH8141> and said<WH559> to him, "We will not hide<WH3582> from my lord<WH113> that our money<WH3701> is all<WH8552> spent,<WH8552> and the cattle<WH4735> <WH929> are my lord<WH113>'s. There is nothing<WH3808> left<WH7604> for my lord except<WH1115> <WH518> our bodies<WH1472> and our lands.<WH127>

"Why<WH4100> should we die<WH4191> before your eyes,<WH5869> both<WH1571> we and our land<WH127>? Buy<WH7069> us and our land<WH127> for food,<WH3899> and we and our land<WH127> will be slaves<WH5650> to Pharaoh.<WH6547> So give<WH5414> us seed,<WH2233> that we may live<WH2421> and not die,<WH4191> and that the land<WH127> may not be desolate.<WH3456>"

So Joseph<WH3130> bought<WH7069> all<WH3605> the land<WH127> of Egypt<WH4714> for Pharaoh,<WH6547> for every<WH376> Egyptian<WH4714> sold<WH4376> his field,<WH7704> because<WH3588> the famine<WH7458> was severe<WH2388> upon them. Thus the land<WH776> became<WH1961> Pharaoh's.
And as for the people,<WH5971> he removed<WH5674> them to the cities<WH5892> from one end<WH7097> of Egypt's border<WH1366> to the other.<WH7097>

Only<WH7534> the land<WH127> of the priests<WH3548> he did not buy,<WH7069> for the priests<WH3548> had an allotment<WH2706> from Pharaoh,<WH6547> and they lived<WH398> off<WH398> the allotment<WH2706> which<WH834> Pharaoh<WH6547> gave<WH5414> them. Therefore,<WH5921> <WH3651> they did not sell<WH4376> their land.<WH127>

Then Joseph<WH3130> said<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> "Behold,<WH2005> I have today<WH3117> bought<WH7069> you and your land<WH127> for Pharaoh;<WH6547> now,<WH1887> [here] is seed<WH2233> for you, and you may sow<WH2232> the land.<WH127>

"And at the harvest<WH8393> you shall give<WH5414> a fifth<WH2549> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> and four-fifths shall be your own for seed<WH2233> of the field<WH7704> and for your food<WH400> and for those of your households<WH1004> and as food<WH398> for your little<WH2945> ones.<WH2945>"
So they said,<WH559> "You have saved<WH2421> our lives!<WH2421> Let us find<WH4672> favor<WH2580> in the sight<WH5869> of my lord,<WH113> and we will be Pharaoh's slaves.<WH5650>"

And Joseph<WH3130> made<WH7760> it a statute<WH2706> concerning<WH5921> the land<WH127> of Egypt<WH4714> [valid] to this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> that Pharaoh<WH6547> should have the fifth;<WH2569> only<WH7534> the land<WH127> of the priests<WH3548> did not become<WH1961> Pharaoh's.

Now Israel<WH3478> lived<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> in Goshen,<WH1657> and they acquired<WH270> property<WH270> in it and were fruitful<WH6509> and became<WH7235> very<WH3966> numerous.<WH7235>

And Jacob<WH3290> lived<WH2421> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> seventeen<WH7651> <WH6240> years;<WH8141> so the length<WH3117> of Jacob's life<WH9132> was one hundred<WH3967> and forty-seven years.<WH8141>

When the time<WH3117> for Israel<WH3478> to die<WH4191> drew<WH7126> near,<WH7126> he called<WH7121> his son<WH1121> Joseph<WH3130> and said<WH559> to him, "Please,<WH4994> if<WH518> I have found<WH4672> favor<WH2580> in your sight,<WH5869> place<WH7760> now<WH4994> your hand<WH3027> under<WH8478> my thigh<WH3409> and deal<WH6213> with me in kindness<WH2617> and faithfulness.<WH571> Please<WH4994> do not bury<WH6912> me in Egypt,<WH4714>

but when I lie<WH7901> down<WH7901> with my fathers, you shall carry<WH1> me out of Egypt<WH5375> and bury<WH4714> me in their burial<WH6912> place.<WH6900> "And he said,<WH6900> "I will do<WH559> as you have said.<WH6213> "
And he said,<WH559> "Swear<WH7650> to me." So he swore<WH7650> to him. Then Israel<WH3478> bowed<WH7812> [in worship] at the head<WH7218> of the bed.<WH4296>
